name: Payment Plans in Billing tab should be listed based on Program and Bill type when the program is Retro

testSteps.description: 1: Payment Plans in Billing tab should be listed based on Program and Bill type when the program is Retro ({StreetAddress=19 LYMAN, City=CHICOPEE, Zip=01013, Country=United States, RiskState=Massachusetts, ClassCode=0012})

children.description: Given underwriter has ability to create quote
And with insured address and location as '19 LYMAN', 'CHICOPEE', 'Massachusetts', '01013', 'United States'

And with Program and Market Segment as
| Program | MarketSegment |
| Retrospective | Retrospective Rated Trucking/Transportation |

And with Account Insurance details as
| Code | PremiumNotSubjectToInsuranceSplit | PremiumNotSubjectToInsurancePremium | PremiumSubjectToInsuranceSplit | PremiumSubjectToInsurancePremium |
| W01 | 1000000 | 1000 | 1000000 | 1000 |
When underwriter calculates premium for quote
And underwriter is on home page
And underwriter navigates to Payment Plan

Then Bill type should have the following options
| Direct Bill |
| Wholesale Bill |

And Pay plan should be below options
| Annual |
| Down Payment Plus 9 Installments |
| Down Payment Plus 9 Installments - AmWins |
| Monthly |
| Monthly with Security Deposit |
| Quarterly |
| Semi-Annual |
| Full Pay |
